Angular Consent

Easily add consent messages to your AngularJS application

Consent one

This message will keep appearing until you click the Agree button. Even if you close your browser and come back later. Once you click "Agree" it will be remembered forever.

Thank you!

Consent two

You can have multiple consents on a single page. The directive automatically keeps track of which consent is already agreed with.

Thank you!

Consent three

You can use your own markup and CSS to make them fit perfectly in your application.

Ok, agree

Thank you!
